SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.policy.refresh

Interface IPolicyRefreshPlugin

All Superinterfaces:
InternalPlugin, Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
PolicyRefreshPluginBase
public interface IPolicyRefreshPlugin extends InternalPlugin

The IPolicyRefreshPlugin specifies the high-level algorithm used when refreshing an existing ClaimCenter Policy with an updated policy from the policy system. The methods are called in the following order:

  1. compare() - finds the differences between the old and new policy graphs (the following steps are skipped if there are no differences)
  2. getDisplay() - prepares the differences for display to the user (the following steps are skipped if the user cancels the refresh based on this information)
  3. relink() - swaps out the old policy graph for the new one
  4. removeOldPolicy() - deletes the old policy graph

Author:
bspies
See Also:
  • IPolicySearchAdapter

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PolicyComparison
    compare(Policy existingPolicy, Policy newPolicy)
    Performs a comparison of two policies: the existing policy in ClaimCenter and the new policy as retrieved from the policy system using the policy search adapter plugin.
    PolicyRefreshUI
    getDisplay(PolicyComparison comparison)
    Prepares the information in a PolicyComparison for presentation to the user.
    void
    relink(Set<RelinkBean<KeyableBean>> toBeRelinked, RelinkContext relinkContext)
    Disconnects links between the claim graph and old policy graph and reconstructs them between the claim graph and new policy graph.
    void
    removeOldPolicy(Set<KeyableBean> policyBeansToRemove)
    Removes the old policy graph.

  • Method Details

    • compare

      PolicyComparison compare(Policy existingPolicy, Policy newPolicy)
      Performs a comparison of two policies: the existing policy in ClaimCenter and the new policy as retrieved from the policy system using the policy search adapter plugin.
      Parameters:
      existingPolicy - The existing policy
      newPolicy - The policy retrieved from the policy search
      Returns:
      The policy comparison; if QueryableBeanComparison.hasDifferences() returns false on the result, no further refresh steps are taken
      See Also:
      • IPolicySearchAdapter.retrievePolicyFromPolicy(entity.Policy)

    • getDisplay

      PolicyRefreshUI getDisplay(PolicyComparison comparison)
      Prepares the information in a PolicyComparison for presentation to the user. The returned representation includes information about the differences between the policies for display in the policy refresh wizard.
      Parameters:
      comparison - The policy comparison
      Returns:
      The object used to build the Policy Refresh wizard UI

    • relink

      void relink(Set<RelinkBean<KeyableBean>> toBeRelinked, RelinkContext relinkContext)
      Disconnects links between the claim graph and old policy graph and reconstructs them between the claim graph and new policy graph.
      Parameters:
      toBeRelinked - The set of non-Policy entities that currently are linked to the old Policy
      relinkContext - The policy relinking context

    • removeOldPolicy

      void removeOldPolicy(Set<KeyableBean> policyBeansToRemove)
      Removes the old policy graph. Implementations should delete, not just retire, the identified beans.
      Parameters:
      policyBeansToRemove - The set of policy-only beans from the old policy
